definition: hiss/neigh/Ss! (sound of air sucked between the teeth, indicating hesitation or thinking over)

sentences.english: He routinely reprimanded employees at the top of his lungs.
sentences.chinese: 他如往常一樣聲嘶力竭地訓斥着手下的員工。

sentences.english: She bawled her senseless ditties to the audience.
sentences.chinese: 她聲嘶力竭對聽衆唱出她那無意義的小曲。

sentences.english: I shouted desperately, throwing water over him to put out the flames.
sentences.chinese: 我一邊聲嘶力竭地叫着，一邊把水潑到他身上滅火。

sentences.english: 3In the middle of the night, the villagers woke to the sound of blood-curdling shrieks coming from the pasture.
sentences.chinese: 3半夜，村民被從草原傳來的聲嘶力竭的尖叫聲驚醒。
歌手聲嘶力竭地演唱，連嗓子都喊啞了。

sentences.english: I yelled at the top of my lungs to get tom's attention.
sentences.chinese: 我聲嘶力竭地大喊想要引起湯姆的注意。

sentences.english: In the middle of the night, the villagers woke to the sound of blood- curdling shrieks coming from the pasture.
sentences.chinese: 半夜，村民被從草原傳來的聲嘶力竭的尖叫聲驚醒。

definition: to lose one's voice/(to cry out) involuntarily
to burst into tears/to sob loudly/to bawl
scene which recalls past memories (idiom)/evocative of the past/reminiscent/to arouse deep feelings
to turn tears into laughter (idiom); to turn grief into happiness
sound track/track number (e.g. on a CD)
(of sound) to never stop/to fall incessantly on the ear/to linger on
unable to sit or stand still (out of nervousness etc) (idiom)
